name: FarmingCat
description:
You're a cat in a world of islands. You can explore, craft, cook, build, destroy, collect drops, discover items of old ancestors and automatize all! Don't worry about monsters, no one will attack you. But you have to care about food, stamina and economy!

The game will have an update every Monday.



GAMEPLAY
Build and destroy whatever you want! The world is yours.

Cultivate vegetables, optimize the quality of them and the time of growing. You can do it with the right fertiliser and obviously you have to pay attention on seasons.

Make your frist boat and start to explore the world, find the best place to create a big and productive farm.

Sell your vegetables to traders and give attention to the price and the best offering.

Find treasures left by ancient civilizations, take them to the museum and analyze them to find out what this civilization was hiding.

Go mine to discover minerals and go deep to find rare ore. Care about stamina and food, taking with you some food it's not a bad idea.

Your inventory has a small capacity, decide with awareness what to take in your travels.

Cook quality receipes with your vegetables and their will fill you more than normal food.

Complete your collection to unlock interesting things. Maybe a prize is waiting for you.



If you have an advice, please tell me. You can write me directly on my socials
